hints.content:
Let's start by comparing the highest place value - the hundred thousands.  

$\greenD{606{,}160}$ and $\blueD{606{,}116}$ both have $6$ hundred thousands.  


What is the highest place value where the numbers have different digits?

$\begin{align}\greenD{606{,}1\underline60}& \\\\
\blueD{606{,}1\underline16}& \end{align}$

$\greenD{606{,}160}$ has $6$ tens. $\blueD{606{,}116}$ has $1$ ten.  

$\greenD{606{,}160}$ has more tens, so it is greater than $\blueD{606{,}116}$.

question.content:
